## 模拟线性回归


```{r}
n <- 100
beta <- c(2, 3, 4)

fake_data <-
  tibble(
    x1 = rnorm(n, mean = 0, sd = 1),
    x2 = rnorm(n, mean = 5, sd = 4)
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    y = rnorm(n, mean = beta[1] + beta[2] * x1 + beta[3] * x2, sd = 2)
  )
head(fake_data)
```


```{r}
fit <- lm( y ~ x1 + x2,  data = fake_data)
fit
```
